name: open-personal-archive-functions
description: This library contains Firebase Functions implemented for the Open Personal Archive™ (OPA) system that expose the server-side functionality to the client-side applications (e.g. WebApp or MobileApp).
author: Open Personal Archive™

scripts.prebuild: node -p "'export const NAME = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').name) + ';\n' + 'export const VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';\n' + 'export const BUILD_DATE = ' + JSON.stringify((new Date()).toISOString()) + ';'" > src/PackageInfo.ts
scripts.build: cd ../domainlogic & npm run build & cd ../functions & tsc
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
